author: sebb
msg: Automatically run the buildnumber plugin unless the buildNumber.skip property is defined as true

author: dennisl
msg: Remove "Workaround for SUREFIRE-300" property. The Surefire plugin works fine for me without it in both Maven 2.2.1 and 3.0.3.

author: uschindler
msg: LUCENE-3305: Catching IOEx and rethrowing as RuntimeEx in TokenInfoDictionary ctor is not needed as ctor already throws IOEx. Made FST final.

author: dennisl
msg: Fix failing ITs by setting the properties for the skin artifact dynamically.
These two failed for me locally because I didn't have version 1.1-SNAPSHOT of maven-fluido-skin installed in my local repository.
